title: New: Brooke Bentham – We'll Be Ghosts
body:
_We’ll Be Ghosts_, the goosebumps-inducing debut single from Newcastle’s **Brooke Bentham**, not only showcases one of the most beautiful new voices of recent times, but also the mark of a truly talented songwriter.

From the tender opening notes, to the heartbreaking crescendo, it’s a stunning first outing. Check out We’ll Be Ghosts below, alongside a cover of Bombay Bicycle Club’s Dust On The Ground.
